title: Google\Cloud\AIPlatform\V1\ActiveLearningConfig
name: ActiveLearningConfig
description:
Parameters that configure the active learning pipeline. Active learning will label the data incrementally by several iterations. For every iteration, it will select a batch of data based on the sampling strategy.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.aiplatform.v1.ActiveLearningConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.max_data_item_percentage
params.description: Max percent of total DataItems for human labeling.

params.name: data.sample_config
params.description: Active learning data sampling config. For every active learning labeling iteration, it will select a batch of data based on the sampling strategy.

params.name: data.training_config
params.description: CMLE training config. For every active learning labeling iteration, system will train a machine learning model on CMLE. The trained model will be used by data sampling algorithm to select DataItems.

methods.name: getMaxDataItemCount
methods.description:
Max number of human labeled DataItems.

Generated from protobuf field int64 max_data_item_count = 1;

methods.description:
